newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: S.Africa's Rand Merchant Bank boosts year profit.
newsitem.headline: S.Africa's Rand Merchant Bank boosts year profit.

text.p: Full name: Rand Merchant Bank Ltd, a wholly-owned subsidiary of Momentum Life Assurers Ltd within the RMB Holdings Ltd group.

NOTE - Managing director Paul Harris said the bank had seen strong organic growth from all divisions - corporate finance, structured finance, investment banking, treasury and special projects. The sharp rise in investment and other income signified good results from non-lending activities.
The bad/doubtful charge write-off represented a conservative 1.5 percent of total advances, far higher than the average bad debt write-off of 0.7 percent over the past five years, he added.

The bank said it remained well-positioned in spite of the growing local presence of international banks. "It is anticipated that RMB should achieve its targeted growth in earnings in the next financial year," a statement with the results said.
